name: PACEhub
overview:
PACEhub seeks to accelerate US cleantech adoption by promoting an innovative city/county-wide financing mechanism called Property Assessed Clean Energy (PACE), a bonding program which allows participants to borrow money for renewable energy systems and large-scale retrofits and then repay it over time through a special assessment on their property tax bill.

The PACEhub team is a group of scientific, financial and business experts who are uniquely capable of expediting the adoption of clean energy technologies.

PACEhub seeks to be the one-stop business incubator of this program by providing vital information such as market research, data analytics, and demand aggregation to all areas of the country to better assist municipalities, contractors/project developers, and ultimately the consumer in transitioning to a cleaner, more energy efficient society.
